TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. An evil race known as the spaceballs stop by and steal you to provide an atmosphere for their planet.

I wish everyone would go to plad.

Granted, but everyone spontaneously combusts before they can begin their journey.

I wish for some hexanitrohexaazaisowurtzitane.

Granted, but I have no idea what that is so you get a rubber chicken instead.

I wish KSP could handle more mods.

a granted I drop a bunch of hex containers on you

I wish for time travel

I love the smell of ninjas in the morning... NOT

Granted, but you end up in a paradox-state and the universe eats you up as though you never existed.

I wish for a fork.

granted it's stuck in your eye

I wish for nothing

Granted, but it's one of those crummy plastic ones. And it was on the ground. Ew.

Ninjas ninja'ing ninjas! Granted but the universe evaporates into nothing.

I wish... for SOUND!

I love the smell of ninjas in the morning... NOT

Teehee.

Granted. Your entire city is felled by a rather loud earthquake.

I wish for LIGHT.

granted but you go to it and then nothing for the rest of time

(I never knew there were so may mod in this section...)

I wish for MOAR BOOSTERS

Granted, but you simply end up vaporising Kerbin.

(there aren't; we just decided to drop by)

I wish for more DRAMA, more INTRIGUE.

Granted, someone assassinates you and takes your mod throne.

I wish for more Korean dramas.

granted, they have an extremely low production value.

I wish the forum games wasn't occupied by the mods.

Granted, but we just watch from the shadows instead.

I wish I had some food.

Granted, kraken meat

I wish I was free

Granted, 'free'range... Start laying some eggs.

I wish for Krakens for all!

Granted, falling for the sky like raindrops!

I wish for the glowing squid from 0.22 trailer

granted it's a baby kracken

I wish for a new Google picture war but with stricter rules

Granted. The pictures never load.

I wish that the new threads never derail.

Granted, but you can't find it. (There is a Google picture reloaded thread)

I wish unlimited wishes.

Granted, they're all corrupted

I wish to stop having wierd dreams and nightmare

granted there instead all about TRF

I wish that the poster of the new google pictrue war would take personal bias out of the OP

Granted. He quits the forums and the thread gets locked.

I wish that I had my gaming laptop fixed.

granted but it get's broken again

I wish for a non personal biased pic war thread

Granted but it gets locked for no apparent reason.

I wish for a wish so I can wish for moar wishes.

Granted, more corruptions

I wish for atheist
